articles.title: Google Pixel 9a Review: Hidden Android Gem?
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google is set to launch the Pixel 9a smartphone in April 2025, targeting the mid-range market. The Pixel 9a features a flat-back design, a 6.3-inch POLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a Tensor G4 chipset, and an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance. The phone will be available in four colors: Iris, Peony, Obsidian, and Porcelain.

articles.title: Fresh Start for Spring: Roborock Washer-Dryers Now on Promotion at Naver Smart Store
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Roborock is offering limited-time deals on its intelligent all-in-one washer-dryers during Naver's Spring Promotion from April 21 to May 6, 2025. The Zeo Series includes three models, H1, H1 Lite, and M1, designed for modern, efficient, and fabric-friendly laundry care, ideal for compact spaces and smart first-home setups.

articles.title: X7 Pro & iPad Air (M2) Price Drops
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Poco's F7 series, featuring the X7 Pro, offers a balance of performance and affordability. Apple has released new iPad Air tablets with the M2 chip in 2024 and refreshed them with M3-based models this year. Xiaomi's Pad 7 and Pad 7 Pro stand out with their features and competitive pricing, while the Amazon Fire Max 11 provides a good option for media consumption and light productivity.

articles.title: 'Iconic London's new bronzing drops gave me the perfect holiday tan without the sun'
articles.summary: Iconic London launched its new Bronzing Elixir last week. Priced at £25, the hydrating, tinted elixir contains hyaluronic acid and lemon water, designed to give a healthy, radiant glow.

articles.title: Shoppers Say This $5 Perfume ‘Smells Just Like' the Discontinued Bath & Body Works Pink Chiffon Perfume
articles.author: Maggie Clancy
articles.summary: Bodycology's Sweet Love Fragrance Mist is presented as a replacement for Bath & Body Works' discontinued Pink Chiffon fragrance. The mist features a blend of sparkling red pear, sweet strawberry, and warm musk. Its $5 price point, vegan and cruelty-free formula, and light, wearable scent profile make it a popular choice.

articles.title: Peak launches affordable Peak Mini
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: FrieslandCampina WAMCO Nigeria PLC, producer of Peak Milk, is introducing Peak Mini, aiming to nourish Nigerians with quality dairy nutrition.

articles.title: NCDF launches N500m fortune accelerator to build Nigeria's next unicorn startups
articles.author: Tribune
articles.summary: NCDF launched a N500m Fortune Entrepreneur Accelerator, Summit & Venture Capital Programme. This accelerator aims to build Nigeria's next unicorn startups.

articles.title: The Only Gluten-Free Bagel You Can Get At Trader Joe's
articles.author: Maria Scinto
articles.summary: Trader Joe's introduced a gluten-free mini sheet cake in 2025. The cake is available in only one flavor (yellow). Trader Joe's also offers an "almost everything" gluten-free bagel.

articles.title: Amazon's secret overstock section is packed with savings — our picks start at $7
articles.summary: Amazon offers discounted overstocked products, including the Uokmor Cordless Water Flosser for $15 (50% off), Woruda Charging Station for $21 (over 45% off), Jeebuu Bartender Kit for $26 (35% off), and Proscenic Cordless Vacuum Cleaner for $130 (35% off). These items are available through Amazon's outlet section, offering Prime members free shipping.

articles.title: Bezos' Latest AI Move Could Change How You Shop on Amazon — Here's What To Expect
articles.summary: Amazon has launched new AI-powered features, 'Interests' and 'Buy for Me,' designed to personalize the shopping experience. 'Interests' suggests products based on user preferences, while 'Buy for Me' allows purchasing items directly from brands' websites through the Amazon app. Both features are currently in beta, with 'Buy for Me' available on the Amazon Shopping app and 'Interests' accessible on the app and Amazon mobile website for select U.S. users.

articles.title: Peak launches affordable 'Peak Mini'
articles.author: Samuel Oamen
articles.summary: FrieslandCampina WAMCO Nigeria PLC, through its Peak Milk brand, has launched Peak Mini, a smaller, more affordable version of its Peak Evaporated Milk. This new product aims to provide quality dairy nutrition to a wider range of consumers, addressing affordability concerns while maintaining the same premium taste and nutritional benefits.

articles.title: Spartans prevail in extra-inning battle against Buckeyes
articles.summary: StateNews.com has launched a new version of its website. Users are invited to test drive the new StateNews.com.

articles.title: Samsung revolutionizes laundry with new Bespoke AI washers and dryers
articles.author: Amit Malewar
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its Bespoke AI Laundry lineup, featuring washers and dryers with AI technology and user-friendly features. The new lineup includes built-in 7-inch AI Home screens, improved AI Wash+ and AI Dry+ technologies, and options for various sizes and heating methods. The Bespoke AI Laundry products also boast impressive capacity options, ranging from 24-inch small-space-friendly sets to 27-inch large-capacity units.

articles.title: Nivea endorser Janine Gutierrez's ‘lazy girl' routine
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: NIVEA introduced new brand ambassadors at the Nivea Skin Haus event. Janine Gutierrez endorses the Nivea Luminous 630 line, which contains Thiamidol and hyaluronic acid. Nivea products sold in the Philippines have formulas tested on Asian skin.

articles.title: Finally, streaming services are getting AI features that make sense
articles.author: Eli Becht
articles.summary: Netflix is testing a new AI-powered feature that provides viewers with recommendations based on their mood. Prime Video has introduced a way to jump to specific scenes within a movie as part of the new Alexa+ upgrade.

articles.title: Digital banks face trust challenges
articles.summary: GXBank launched its digital banking services in November 2023, attracting nearly one million customers within nine months with high deposit rates and cashbacks. The service was initially offered with promotional rates and free trials for new subscribers.

articles.title: If You Have A Busy Social Schedule Coming Up, These 30 Walmart Dresses Will Have Your Back
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a wide array of new dresses. These include options like flutter-sleeve dresses, sequin dresses, floral dresses, maxi dresses, and maternity dresses. Prices for these dresses range from \$14.98 to \$71.99, with varying sizes and colors available.

articles.title: Naver, Kurly form alliance to challenge Coupang in fresh food e-commerce
articles.author: 공탈출 행정학
articles.summary: Market Kurly's products will be launched on Naver's artificial intelligence-powered shopping platform, Naver Plus Store. This partnership allows Naver to strengthen its fresh food category and provides Kurly with access to Naver's user base as an expanded sales channel.

articles.title: A cradle of innovation in Pune with a soothing touch of AI
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: An Indian couple is introducing AI cribs to the global baby tech market. The AI cribs represent a new product launch within the baby tech industry.

articles.title: These 'Shark Tank' household hacks are game-changing — get our favorites, from $10
articles.summary: Shark Tank featured ingenious inventions are available on Amazon, including items like a banana hat for ripeness control, drain hair-catchers, and an egg-shaped laundry detergent alternative. These products are designed to simplify tasks and are available with free shipping options for Amazon Prime members and orders over $35.

articles.title: Mercedes-Benz revives 1980s icon with rugged looks and powerful engine
articles.author: Jack Mortimer
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz has launched the G-Class 'Stronger than the 1980s' special edition, paying homage to the original model with retro styling elements like Agave Green or Colorado Beige paintwork, black plastic replacing chrome, and orange indicators. This special edition includes rugged features such as a roof ladder and mud flaps, along with unique interior touches like chequered 'Dove Grey' fabric seats and 'Stronger than the 1980s' inscription on the dashboard. It still features modern amenities and a 3.0-litre six-cylinder diesel engine.

articles.title: She left corporate life behind. Now, she's leading a window-washing business.
articles.author: Kylie Garcia
articles.summary: Carla Lee Martinez launched Pink's Window Services Albuquerque franchise in late February, offering residential and commercial window, gutter, and solar panel cleaning, along with pressure washing services. The business currently serves the Albuquerque and Rio Rancho area and plans to expand operations in the future.

articles.title: 44 Things Under $10 To Help You Make All Sorts Of Upgrades And Repairs To Get Way More Mileage Out Of Your Stuff
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article highlights a range of newly recommended products available for purchase, mainly on Amazon. These include household cleaning solutions like Goo Gone and The Pink Stuff, fabric dyes from Rit, as well as home improvement items such as cabinet pulls and LED light strips. Additionally, it features various organizational and repair products, such as handbag organizers and jean button replacement kits.

articles.title: Parents and pet owners rave over portable washer-dryer perfect for travel
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: POPPYLANE washer is available on Amazon for £35.99 and has an 11-liter capacity with three adjustable wash cycles. Leisurewize Twin Tub Washing Machine from Argos costs £140, has a 3kg washing capacity and two wash settings. The Costway Washing Machine from Debenhams is priced at £69.95 and has a 2.5kg capacity with wash and spin timers.

articles.title: Thousands Of 5-Star Reviews Don't Lie: You'll Want These 27 Spring-Appropriate Pieces Of Amazon Clothing
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: Amazon offers a variety of new clothing items, including dresses, skirts, jeans, and tops, available in multiple sizes and colors. These items, ranging from strapless tops and midi skirts to palazzo pants and maxi dresses, are highlighted with reviewer quotes and prices, offering diverse options for different styles and occasions.

articles.title: Fashion fans rave about the perfect holiday shorts from M&S that ‘work wonders' to stop chub rub
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) is receiving positive customer reviews for its anti-chafe shorts, designed to prevent thigh chafing. These shorts, available in sizes 8 to 22, are made with added stretch and cotton for a flexible feel and feature a wide waistband. They are sold in a pack of two for £20.

articles.title: Fashion fans rave about the perfect holiday shorts from M&S that ‘work wonders' to stop chub rub
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: M&S is promoting their 'anti-chafe shorts,' a two-pack priced at £20, available in sizes 8-22 and various colors. These shorts are designed to eliminate chafing and static while shaping the silhouette, receiving positive feedback from customers who praise their comfort and effectiveness under dresses and skirts.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G Stylus 5G (2025) Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Motorola officially announced the Moto G Stylus 5G (2025) on April 8, 2025, and released it on April 17, 2025. This 5G smartphone features a 5000 mAh battery with 68W wired and 15W wireless charging, a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a dual-camera setup with a 50MP main sensor.

articles.title: Shoppers 'enjoy trying everything' in £50 beauty box worth £170 with Medik8
articles.author: What's On Writer
articles.summary: LookFantastic launched 'The Dermatological Edit' beauty box for £50, featuring skin and body care products worth over £170. Next offers 'The Calm Collective Beauty Box' for £30, containing skincare and bodycare goodies worth over £123. Cult Beauty has launched 'The Set for Sun Edit' for £40, including eight beauty treats worth £175.

articles.title: Unlock 15% off and free shipping with your adidas adiClub membership
articles.author: Rachel Cortez
articles.summary: Adidas offers a free adiClub membership that provides benefits such as free shipping, exclusive sales access, and coupons. Members earn points through purchases, product reviews, and workouts, which can be redeemed for vouchers, gift cards, and subscriptions to services like Spotify, Calm, and MLS Season Pass. The adiClub Days sales event, starting April 23, 2025, will offer exclusive perks like member-only drops and early access to new products.

articles.title: Unlock 15% off and free shipping with your adidas adiClub membership
articles.author: Rachel Cortez
articles.summary: Adidas is introducing adiClub, a free rewards program that grants members free shipping on all Adidas purchases, special access to upcoming sales, and exclusive coupons. AdiClub Days is set to begin on April 23, 2025, offering exclusive perks, member-only drops, promotions, giveaways, and early access to new products.

articles.title: Amazon's 'most powerful' tablet is now £70 off in latest sale - but you'll need to be quick
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a £70 discount on its Fire Max 11 tablet, reducing the price by 30%. The Fire Max 11, which Amazon touts as its 'most powerful' tablet, features an 11-inch screen, 64GB or 128GB of storage, and up to 14 hours of battery life.

articles.title: Ayuda App Officially Launched to Bridge Service Gaps and Tackle Unemployment
articles.summary: Ayudahub Limited launched the Ayuda App, a digital platform connecting users with home and commercial service providers. The app offers services like cleaning, electrical repairs, and plumbing, aiming to provide convenient and trustworthy service delivery in Ghana. It also offers a dual-service model: Premium and Flex options.

articles.title: A Portuguese Tech Powerhouse Poised to Make Waves Globally
articles.author: Paulo Lopes
articles.summary: Conkord, a new brand formed from the consolidation of Readiness IT, Ritain.io, Latitudde, and Red IT, has been launched. Conkord will offer end-to-end solutions, including digital advisory, transformation consulting, software delivery, cloud architecture, and AI-powered development.

articles.title: Quicker Fixer-Uppers
articles.author: Paul Williams Contributor
articles.summary: Home Depot is launching 'Magic Apron,' a generative AI tool providing how-to advice and product support on their website and mobile app. Lowe's introduces 'Mylow,' an AI-powered virtual assistant developed with OpenAI, offering expert advice and project solutions to customers initially through desktop and mobile web, with plans to expand to voice capabilities and their app.

articles.title: How long should your smartphone actually last?
articles.author: Faith Leroux
articles.summary: OnePlus 13 offers four years of Android updates and six years of security updates. Motorola G75 provides five generations of updates. Samsung previously brought a four-year software and five-year security update policy for older flagships.

articles.title: Reviewers Call This Power Scrubber 'A Perfect Miracle' For Grout And Tile
articles.author: Sakinah Ali
articles.summary: Rubbermaid's Reveal Power Scrubber, available on Amazon, is receiving positive reviews for its ability to quickly and effectively clean grout, tile, and other surfaces. The scrubber features two modes and an oscillating head that scrubs 60 times per second, making it a powerful alternative to manual scrubbing. It is also used on grills, patio furniture, car detailing and tires.

articles.title: Dreame X 40 Ultra: This robotic cleaner doesn't exist in a vacuum
articles.author: Abhishek Baxi
articles.summary: The Dreame X40 Ultra, a 2-in-1 robot vacuum cleaner, has been launched with features like powerful suction, a rotating mop system, smart navigation, and a comprehensive base station for automatic dust emptying and mop cleaning. It is positioned as a premium product and competes with other brands such as iRobot, Ecovacs, and Xiaomi in the Indian market.

articles.title: 'Zingy' Marc Jacobs perfume that 'lasts all day' 40% less in Lookfantastic sale
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Lookfantastic is offering a discount on Marc Jacobs' Daisy Ever So Fresh Eau de Parfum, launched in 2022. Amazon is offering discount on Olaplex No. 7 Bonding Oil. The Marc Jacobs fragrance is described as "sparkling" with notes of mandarin, mango, and pineapple, while the Olaplex hair oil contains coconut-derived emollient, vitamin E and sunflower oil.

articles.title: AI Platform Transforming Industries
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: AI Magicx, an AI platform, offers a lifetime subscription to its tools for creative and professional tasks. The platform boasts features like AI-driven logo design, art generation, dynamic chatbots, story creators, MagicXBot (an AI assistant), and AI MagicX Coder (for code optimization). The promotion for AI Magicx's Rune Plan, which offered lifetime access for $59.97, has ended.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: the best and the worst of the new console - Reader's Feature
articles.author: Game Central
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to release the Switch 2, building upon the success of its predecessor with improvements like a bigger HDR screen and improved Joy-Cons. The console is expected to have graphical capabilities exceeding the PlayStation 4 and will feature a game lineup including Mario Kart World, Donkey Kong Bananza, and Metroid Prime 4. Third-party support is confirmed with titles like Elden Ring, Cyberpunk 2077, Final Fantasy 7 remake, Star Wars Outlaws, and Street Fighter 6.

articles.title: G Market, an e-commerce company affiliated with Shinsegae Group, announced on the 20th that it will ..
articles.author: Kim Si-Kyun
articles.summary: Gmarket is introducing a new "Seller Star Delivery" service, expanding its "Star Delivery" arrival guarantee to general open market sellers. This service, with delivery handled by CJ Korea Express, aims to guarantee 100% arrival and already has over 400 participating brand manufacturers including Samsung Electronics. The new service extends to brands and small business owners who used individual logistics warehouses.

articles.title: LG Unveils ‘Smart Monitor Swing' to Reinforce Leadership in Portable Display Market
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched the 'LG Smart Monitor Swing,' a 32-inch 4K UHD display with a versatile monitor arm, mobile stand, and full adjustability. Powered by LG's webOS smart TV platform, the monitor can operate independently of PCs and will be available starting April 24 for 1.049 million won.

articles.title: The bonkers high-tech Denza Z9 GT crabwalks and I've just driven one
articles.author: Rob Clymo
articles.summary: BYD's high-tech sub-brand, Denza, is preparing to launch its premium model, the Z9 GT, in Europe early next year as an EV or a plug-in. The Denza Z9 GT features a four-wheel steering system and offers screen magic, the centrepiece being a 17.3in touchscreen, supplemented by 13.2in screens, one for the driver and the other for the front seat passenger.

articles.title: Shoppers rush to buy Olay's makeup-friendly sun cream for half price
articles.author: Tiffany Lo
articles.summary: Olay has launched the SPF50+ Brighten & Glow Vitamin C Moisturising Fluid, a makeup-friendly sun cream. This three-in-one skincare product offers an instant glow, anti-dark spot action, and 24-hour hydration and is available at Boots and Amazon.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics is further expanding its sales point of its 2025 laundry dryer "Bespoke AI Combo..
articles.author: Park Seung Ju
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is expanding the sales of its new 2025 'Bespoke AI Combo' laundry dryer to 1,000 stores. The new model features a larger capacity while maintaining the same exterior size, a faster drying cycle and enhanced AI features such as 'AI Customization+' and 'AI Detergent Automatic Input'.

articles.title: Polaroid Unveils Analogue ‘Flip' Point-and-Shoot Camera, Coming in May
articles.author: Dean Blake
articles.summary: Polaroid is launching the Polaroid Flip camera on May 13th for US$199. The Polaroid Flip uses Polaroid Film Packs and features a hyper-focal 4-lens system with Sonar Autofocus and a powerful flash for better photos.

articles.title: Vax vacuum loved by 10,000 shoppers slashed to £65 in Amazon sale
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Vax is offering its Mach Air Upright Vacuum Cleaner for £65.55 on Amazon, which is 27% off the retail price. The vacuum is lightweight with a 1.5-liter capacity and comes with attachments. Competitors include Shark's Classic Upright Vacuum and Dyson's Ball Animal Multi-floor.

articles.title: Samsung expands Bespoke AI combo sales to 1,000 stores nationwide
articles.author: Kim Su-Jeong
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is expanding the sales outlets of its new Bespoke AI Combo to approximately 1,000 stores, including Samsung.com, Samsung Store, Hi-Mart, Emart, and Electronics Land. The 2025 model offers enhanced features such as a maximum washing capacity of 25 kg, a drying capacity of 18 kg, a quicker drying time and AI-powered functionalities accessible via the AI Subscription Club.

articles.title: Gmarket launches Seller Star Delivery service to enhance delivery guarantees
articles.author: Choi Hyo-Jung
articles.summary: Gmarket, an e-commerce platform under Shinsegae Group, is introducing 'Seller Star Delivery', a new service guaranteeing delivery dates for customers. The service, managed by CJ Logistics, expands beyond sellers using Gmarket's Mega Center to include various companies. Gmarket intends to improve customer accessibility and product visibility by launching a dedicated Star Delivery section.

articles.title: Sunscreen and snail slime: what skincare experts do – and don't do
articles.author: Joe Stone
articles.summary: Dr. Angela Tewari uses a mild glycolic wash from Tropic containing jojoba oil, followed by Neova's DNA repair serum. She then applies SkinCeuticals' Phyto A+ Brightening Treatment, and finishes with Clinique's Moisture Surge Sheertint Hydrator SPF 25. She also recommends Nivea body lotion Q10.

articles.title: China's BYD unveils 820-mile range hybrid EV with retractable drone landing pad
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: BYD has launched the Sealion 07, a plug-in hybrid vehicle, offering an 820-mile range and intelligent features. The Sealion 07 DM-i Intelligent Driving Version is available in three variants priced between $26,300 and $31,800.
